meanings.definition: A team sport played with an oval ball by two teams of 15 players.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the kids played rugby in the field.
meanings.sent2: The rugby match was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent3: The rugby game ended in a tie, causing much laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her determination in the rugby game was like a lion hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rugby players colliding echoed across the field.

meanings.definition: The ball used in the sport of rugby.
meanings.sent1: He kicked the rugby with precision towards the goalposts.
meanings.sent2: The rugby was passed swiftly between players during the match.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with the rugby, causing a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: The rugby soared through the air like a bird taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The shiny surface of the rugby gleamed under the stadium lights.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a high top, typically made of canvas or leather.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite rugby to the dance, feeling stylish.
meanings.sent2: The rugby provided good ankle support during the hike.
meanings.sent3: His old rugby had seen many adventures and stories.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out rugby carried the memories of long walks and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The new rugby smelled of fresh leather and promise.
